message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product.  I believe it would be highly beneficial to you, and I'm confident we can reach a mutually agreeable price. To start the conversation, I propose a price of $1,100,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on this product. After considering its worth to me, I am willing to pay $950,000 for it.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the price you're suggesting doesn't reflect the true value of this product.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits you'll gain.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I would like to stick closer to my initial offer. I am willing to pay $1,000,000 for it.
